alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Brevard County through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Port Canaveral to near Sharpes to near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockledge, Cocoa, Cocoa Beach, Cape Canaveral and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
